summary: Trapped inside his car by a mudslide, smooth talking Jackson Alder suddenly finds himself in a situation he can't talk his way out of. With no hope of rescue, he must defy the odds; battling Mother Nature for his survival.
cast: Neil Hopkins|Brea Grant|John Forest|Ptolemy Slocum|Deb Snyder
keywords: drinking one's urine|jeep|nature|sex scene|sport utility vehicle
title: Detour
